question: In which nation "Arenal Volcano" is located?
explanation: Arenal Volcano is a 7000 years old stratovolcano located in the Alajuela province of Costa Rica. In 1968, it erupted unexpectedly destroying an adjacent small town. It is also known as "Pan de Azucas"; "Canaste"; "Volcan Costa Rica"; "Volcan Rio Frio" or "Guatusos Peak". It houses Arenal Lake Reservoir which is used for generating hydroelectric power.
